title: Ticket #6896: Disable DAGMan graph metrics reporting by default
description:
There's a bug in the DAGMan code that provides graph metrics for completed DAGs. For certain graph structures, the algorithms to calculate height and width can send the code into a (very CPU heavy) infinite loop.

Instead of debugging the core problem, which could take a long time, I'm simply adding a knob to disable this code by default. I'm not aware of anybody needing or using (or even knowing about) these metrics. If anybody actually cares we can look into the bug at a later date.
remarks: CODE REVIEW Code is good. Let's add a version history, as this may have been in a public release.
